sections.text: The professional responsibility obligations and standards applicable to a lawyer or other licensed professional; or
The obligation of a person to report abuse, neglect, abandonment, or exploitation of a child or adult under the law of the District of Columbia.

title.text: Particular Actions, Proceedings and Matters. (Refs & Annos)

heading.catch_text: Standards of professional responsibility and mandatory reporting not affected.
